title.narrative: COMMUNICATION IN MULTIPLE MEDIA

description.narrative: By end of 2021, adolescent programming is strengthened and integrated in education, health, nutrition and Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH), child protection through the operationalization of adolescent programming strategy., which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas (Covid), Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By end of 2021, adolescent programming is strengthened and integrated in education, health, nutrition and WASH, child protection through the operationalization of adolescent programming strategy.

description.narrative: UNICEF continued to be the leading voice on children in Afghanistan in mass media as well as social media platforms. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/06/2020
